                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Detroit specific BRFSS data is drawn from the Michigan Behavioral Risk Factor Survey (MiBRFS), an annual, statewide telephone survey of Michigan adults aged 18 years and older that is conducted through a collaborative effort among the Population Health Surveillance Branch (PHSB) of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the Michigan State University Institute for Public Policy and Social Research (IPPSR), and the Michigan Department of Health and Human Services. Michigan BRFS data contribute to the national Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System that is managed by the PHSB at the CDC.

   <h3>A Certificate of Occupancy (C of O) is the permission to occupy a building or space based on approved permits. The application is submitted to BSEED along with all permits associated with the project. The building permit applicant or licensed professional would apply for the C of O, not necessarily the property owner. The purpose of tracking this information is to verify that the completed project has been approved for occupancy.\n</h3><br /><div><h1 style='font-size: 18px;'><strong>Column definitions</strong></h1><br /></div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <h3>A building permit is the approval given by the Buildings, Safety, \nEngineering and Environmental Department (BSEED) to complete work on a \nbuilding according to City Codes and State of Michigan Construction \nCodes. \n</h3><br /><div><h1 style='font-size:18px;'><b>Column definitions</b></h1><br /><h2><b>record_id</b></h2><p>Unique identifier used to track this permit within BSEED's Accela database.</p><br /><h2><b>street_num</b></h2><p>Street number of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2><b>street_dir</b></h2><p>Street direction of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2><b>street_name</b></h2><p>Street name of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2><b>street_type</b></h2><p>Street type for the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2><b>submitted_date</b></h2><p>Date the application was received. Applications are submitted to BSEED by property owners or licensed professionals.</p><br /><h2><b>issued_date</b></h2><p>Date the permit was issued. The permit is issued when the permit application is approved. Permits are issued by BSEED staff.</p><br /><h2><b>days_to_complete</b></h2><p>Number\n of days the permit holder was given to complete activities articulated \nin the permit. The permit holder is generally given 6 months to complete\n the permit work and more time if there are consistent inspection \nactivities.</p><br /><h2><b>status</b></h2><p>Current status of the permit. All records provided here have a status of Issued.</p><br /><h2><b>amount</b></h2><p>This is the amount the permit applicant was required to pay for the permit.</p><br /><h2><b>current_legal_use</b></h2><p>The\n building's current Type of Use. It is defined by the Michigan Building \nCode in conjunction with the City of Detroit Zoning Ordinance.</p><br /><h2><b>stories</b></h2><p>Stories is the total number of floors in the building. Permits may be issued for individual floors or groups of floors.</p><br /><h2><b>zoning_district</b></h2><p>The\n type of zoning district where the building is located. The City of \nDetroit Zoning Ordinance is written by the City Planning Commission and \napproved by City Council.</p><br /><h2><b>proposed_use</b></h2><p>The\n Type of Use that the permit applicant proposed for the relevant \nbuilding space after the permitted work is completed. The Type of Use is\n defined by the Michigan Building Code in conjunction with the City of \nDetroit Zoning Ordinance.</p><br /><h2><b>type_of_construction</b></h2><p>The\n type of construction activity according to the Michigan Building Code. \nThey are the types of construction used to erect buildings. There are \nfive types and nine sub-categories.</p><br /><h2><b>permit_type</b></h2><p>The category of building permit that was issued.</p><br /><h2><b>description_of_work</b></h2><p>Notes\n and further specifications about the building permit. They may contain \ndetails about the location information, related grants, or related \nbuilding permits.</p><br /><h2><b>parcel_id</b></h2><p>Unique \nnumber used to track the parcel of land the building is located on. \nParcel IDs are assigned by the Office of the Assessor.</p></div>
134                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           <h3>A Business License is the City’s stamp of approval for a business to operate within the city limits. The business licenses are used for certifying the type of business and that they may operate in the city at that location per the Zoning Ordinance.\n</h3><br /><div><h1 style='font-size: 18px;'><strong>Column definitions</strong></h1><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>business_id</strong></h2><p>Unique identifier used to track this business within BSEED's Accela database.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_num</strong></h2><p>Street number of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_dir</strong></h2><p>Street direction of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_name</strong></h2><p>Street name of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_type</strong></h2><p>Street type of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>business_name</strong></h2><p>The name of the business, which could be the Doing Business As (DBA) name, an affiliated Limited Liability Company (LLC) or a personal name.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>business_type</strong></h2><p>The type of the business as defined by Detroit City Code.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>parcel_id</strong></h2><p>Unique number used to track the parcel of land the business is located on. Parcel IDs are assigned by the Office of the Assessor.</p><br /></div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               <div>Blight\n Violation Notices (BVN), or Blight Tickets, that have been issued to \nproperty owners who have violated City of Detroit ordinances that govern\n how property owners must maintain the exterior of their property. \nBlight Tickets are issued by city inspectors, police officers, \nneighborhood city hall managers and other city officials who investigate\n complaints of blight and are managed by the Department of \nAdministrative Hearings. Blight tickets that are issued may be \nsubsequently voided by the ticket writing department for various \nreasons.</div>

Please see <a href='https://detroitmi.gov/departments/buildings-safety-engineering-and-environmental-department/bseed-divisions/property-maintenance/rental-property/lead-requirements' target='_blank' rel='nofollow ugc noopener noreferrer'>here</a> for more information about BSEED's Lead Requirements. 
145                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     <h3>A demolition permit, also sometimes known as a wrecking permit, is required for the wrecking or tearing down of any building or other structure in Detroit. A licensed professional wrecking contractor or in some cases the property owner (size of property restriction) can apply for a demo/wrecking permit. The demolition permit application is submitted to BSEED for approval. Additional demolition-related requirements regarding lead and asbestos abatement are enforced by other agencies. This information is tracked for compliance, safety and property assessment.\n</h3><br /><div><h1 style='font-size: 18px;'><strong>Column definitions</strong></h1><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>record_id</strong></h2><p>Unique identifier used to track this permit within BSEED's Accela database.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_num</strong></h2><p>Street number of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_dir</strong></h2><p>Street direction of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_name</strong></h2><p>Street name of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_type</strong></h2><p>Street type for the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>date_status</strong></h2><p>Date when the status went into effect.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>description</strong></h2><p>The type of work that is being completed on the building at the location.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>owner_name</strong></h2><p>Name of the property owner when the demolition permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_name</strong></h2><p>Name of the licensed professional who will be performing the demolition.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_business_name</strong></h2><p>Business name of the licensed professionals who will be performing the demolition.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_address</strong></h2><p>Business street address of the licensed professionals who will be performing the demolition.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>task</strong></h2><p>Current task for the permit within BSEED's Accela database. All records provided here have a task of 'Permit Issuance'.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>status</strong></h2><p>Current status of the permit. All records provided here have a status of 'Issued'.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>parcel_id</strong></h2><p>Unique number used to track the parcel of land the building is located on. Parcel IDs are assigned by the Office of the Assessor.</p><br /></div>

General Land Use map is an authoritative data of Planning and\nDevelopment Department. The map consists of all areas in the city defined with\nthe Master Plan of Policies Future General Land Use Map. The layer has been\namended on June 01, 2021, since it was adopted. The map will be updated depending\non the neighborhood planning initiatives.

(MDSS), by quarter.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The Act51 Map Layer represents the road network that the City of Detroit reports to the Michigan Department of Transportation on a annual basis.  The Act51 Map Layer identifies road jurisdictions for permitting and planning.  Roads listed under the "MDOT" and "County" refer to the Michigan Department of Transportation and the Wayne County Public Services.  
9  <h3>A trade permit is issued for mechanical, electrical, plumbing, boiler and elevator work done on a building. A licensed professional or a home owner who occupies the dwelling can apply to BSEED for a trade permit. The application approval process involves reviewing the application, verifying the licensed professionals’ information and issuing the permit. A trade permit lasts for six months unless inspection activity occurs consistently. The information is tracked for compliance, safety and property assessment.\n</h3><br /><div><h1 style='font-size: 18px;'><strong>Column definitions</strong></h1><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>record_id</strong></h2><p>Unique identifier used to track this permit within BSEED's Accela database.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_num</strong></h2><p>Street number of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_dir</strong></h2><p>Street direction of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_name</strong></h2><p>Street name of the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>street_type</strong></h2><p>Street type for the property address where the permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>date_status</strong></h2><p>Date when the status went into effect.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>permit_type</strong></h2><p>Permit type is the trade work that is being completed at the property on the permit.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>description</strong></h2><p>The description is the trade work and fixtures that are being installed. Also may contain details about the location of the work or related trades permits.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>owner_name</strong></h2><p>Name of the property owner when the trade permit was issued.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_name</strong></h2><p>Name of the licensed professional who will be completing the work.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_business</strong></h2><p>Trade business of the licensed professionals who will be completing the work.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contractor_address</strong></h2><p>Trade business of the licensed professionals who will be completing the work.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contact_full_name</strong></h2><p>Person that BSEED contacts regarding appointments and other issues.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contact_name_fml</strong></h2><p>Another person that BSEED contacts regarding appointments and other issues.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contact_address</strong></h2><p>Contact person's address.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>contact_business_name</strong></h2><p>Business name of contact person.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>task</strong></h2><p>Current task for the permit within BSEED’s Accela database. All records provided here have a task of 'Permit Issuance'.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>status</strong></h2><p>Current status of the permit. All records provided here have a status of 'Issued'.</p><br /><h2 style='text-size: 12px;'><strong>parcel_id</strong></h2><p>Unique number used to track the parcel of land the building is located on. Parcel IDs are assigned by the Office of the Assessor.</p><br /></div>
